A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: What Star Wars: The Force Awakens may have lacked in originality and depth\, Star Wars: The Last Jedi compensates for with rich\, bold character development and an exciting new direction for a franchise that risked becoming stale. While a few minor issues have been blown out of proportion by fanboys on the internet\, the real challenge people have with this film is actually its greatest strength\, and that is its willingness to break the mould. In a good way. In a great way.
